participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Caring and hardworking, with a strong connection to his pets.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. i'm a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i've 5 cats.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and artistic, with a passion for helping others.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally.
